bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: EA, originally referring to demonic beings, causing sudden loss of consciousness, with an inability to recognize people. The hands and legs are cold, and in some cases blood flows from the mouth and nose. LSZ listed this Etiological Agent. together with xie mei 邪魅 , evil seduction-specters, and gui qi 鬼氣 , demon qi. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry re tang 熱湯 , hot water, quoting Ben cao shi yi 本草拾遺 : 忤死 , “[Appearance of] death because of the hostile”, writes: 忤惡卒死 , “Sudden [appearance of ] death because of the hostile and malign ”.
